eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api

Interface AdvanceEngineControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckedEngineControl, HttpRemoteEngineControl, LocalEngineControl

    public interface AdvanceEngineControl

    The API for interacting with the ADVANCE Flow Engine remotely.

    The API does not have separate insertXYZ type methods to create new instances of various objects. The Integer.MIN_VALUE used as the unique identifier (see id fields will represent the request to create a new object. Once they were created, the proper non-negative unique identifier replaces this value.

    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.09.19.

      • debugBlock

        @NonNull
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observable<eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.BlockDiagnostic> debugBlock(@NonNull

                                                                                                                         java.lang.String blockId)

                                                                                                                          AdvanceControlException
        Ask for the observable sequence of block diagnostic messages for the given block within the given realm.
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm
        blockId - the block unique identifier (as in the flow)
        Returns:
        the observable for the diagnostic messages
        Throws:

        AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to debug in the realm or the block is missing

        @NonNull
hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observable<eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.runtime.PortDiagnostic> debugParameter(@NonNull
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String realm,

                                                                                                                            java.lang.String port)

                                                                                                                             AdvanceControlException
        Ask for the observable sequence of port messages of the given port/block/realm.

        realm - the realm
        blockId - the block unique identifier (as in the flow)
        port - the port name
        Returns:
        the observable of parameter messages
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to debug in the realm or the referenced parameter is missing

      • queryCompilationResult

        @Nullable
eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.compiler.AdvanceCompilationResult queryCompilationResult(@NonNull
                                                                                                 java.lang.String realm)
                                                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                 AdvanceControlException
        Return the compilation result of the given realm. This function may be used to find out why a server-side verification failed or to query the compilation result after a flow upload and realm startup.
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm to query
        Returns:
        the compilation result or null if no compilation was performed since the last startup of the engine
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
        AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to read a flow
